domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse Wake up America we are being lied to we are losing our civil liberties to this covid-19 look how many changes have been made in the last 45 days Mr President put America back to work. You are being made a fool of and so are we the people, put an end to it now!
